mapper.select: SELECT CODE ID , DECODE(CODE_UPR,'0','#',CODE_UPR) PARENT , CODE_NAME TEXT , ORD_NO POSITION , CODE_VALUE FROM EZ_CMM_CODE ORDER BY ORD_NO
SELECT CODE , CODE_NAME , CODE_UPR FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE_UPR='35000000'
SELECT MAX(ORD_NO) ORDNO FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE (CODE_UPR = #{codeUpr} OR CODE = #{codeUpr}) AND USE_YN ='Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE IN ( SELECT CODE FROM EZ_CMM_CODE START WITH CODE = #{code} AND CODE_UPR = #{codeUpr} CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE = CODE_UPR )
